page.title: 02Little Plumstead
page.content:
{ Little Plumstead __________________
{ Little Plumstead}is a small commuter village on the outskirts of the City of Norwich.It contains a mixture of housing with a large number of bungalows dating back to the 1930's when development began to take place in Norfolk.Many of the properties have large plots of land, which was very cheap at the time of their being built.Apart from a few local shops, the people of the village have to rely upon visits to Norwich for their main shopping.Greater Plumstead is the site for a large{Mental Hospital {serving}the Norwich area.
